articles.title: Ex-BBNaija winner Miracle Igbokwe divorces American wife Adaeze - P.M. News
articles.description: An American-based woman identified as Adaeze says that she was once married to ex-Big Brother Naija winner, Miracle  Ikechukwu Igbokwe.
articles.content:
An American-based woman simply identified as Adaeze has said that she was once married to ex-Big Brother Naija winner, Miracle  Ikechukwu Igbokwe.
Adaeze in a video now trending online said she and … [+998 chars]
